document.full_text: crowds camped out in london and foreign dignitaries flew in from around the world for friday's wedding of prince william and kate middleton, a service full of pomp and ceremony that has thrust the monarchy to center stage.
document.title: fervor builds ahead of british royal wedding
lines_and_colors: crowds camped out in london and foreign dignitaries flew in from around the world for friday's wedding of prince william and kate middleton, a service full of pomp and ceremony that has thrust the monarchy to center stage.
